name: Henry The Hamster Handler VR
description: You are Henry, the legendary one-handed hamster handler, and it's your job to save the mass-produced balls of fluff! Itâ€™s time to punch in at Hamsters Inc., where your usual menial task of hamster production and distribution has gone kaput!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
